name: Search4BBM
overview:
Search and connect with users who use BlackBerryÂ® Messenger all around the world. A revolutionary way for BBMers to connect with other users. Search4BBM allows you to search for people and business via Multiple search levels - Searches can be filtered by country, city, gender, interests and even age. Users can also connect easily with their social network friends that use BBM and meet new people by picking up signals from other BBMers, no matter where they are in the world. ADVANCED FEATURES: 1.Innovative and progressive search tool for end users 2.New opportunity for small and medium businesses to generate new clients and communicate with existent one via immediate mobile feature. 3.Easy and simple APIs for other apps and data generators 4.Optimization system includes of tools for enhancing efficiency and maximizing profits

  1. Supporting web system with back office management and BI abilities
